title: QuteErrorPageSetup does not support templates that are not backed by a file
body:
### Describe the bug

```
aused by: io.quarkus.qute.TemplateException: Parser error in template [roq-gen/posts/2024-10-13-the-first-roq.html] line 21: invalid virtual method in {page.date.format('YYYY MM dd'}

	at io.quarkus.qute.Expressions.parseVirtualMethodParams(Expressions.java:42)
	at io.quarkus.qute.Parser.createPart(Parser.java:1049)
	at io.quarkus.qute.Parser.parseExpression(Parser.java:1035)

	at java.base/java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:1575)
	at org.jboss.threads.JBossThread.run(JBossThread.java:499)

2024-11-11 12:23:15,822 WARN  [io.qua.qut.run.dev.QuteErrorPageSetup] (vert.x-eventloop-thread-1) Unable to read the template source: roq-gen/posts/2024-10-13-the-first-roq.html: java.lang.IllegalStateException: Template source not available

Caused by: java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException: Index 0 out of bounds for length 0
	at java.base/jdk.internal.util.Preconditions.outOfBounds(Preconditions.java:100)

2024-11-11 12:23:56,724 WARN  [io.net.boo.ServerBootstrap] (vert.x-acceptor-thread-0) Failed to register an accepted channel: [id: 0x4b7ea862, L:/127.0.0.1:8080 ! R:/127.0.0.1:54053]: java.lang.IllegalStateException
	at io.vertx.core.net.impl.VertxEventLoopGroup.next(VertxEventLoopGroup.java:37)
	at io.vertx.core.net.impl.VertxEventLoopGroup.register(VertxEventLoopGroup.java:53)

```


### How to Reproduce?

Create Roq app:
```shell
quarkus create app roq-with-blog -x=io.quarkiverse.roq:quarkus-roq
```


open dev mode, edit content/posts/2024-10-13-the-first-roq.md by removing the closing `)` from the `page.date.format('YYYY MM dd'`


_No response_
